catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 233
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: standing female figure clutching the hems of her robes in PL hand, near waist; PR arm is raised to mouth; looking over to LL; outer robe is light blue and white; inner robes are red and orange with designs
provenance: Purchased from Frank E. Hart, 1963 by Mary Burke
title: Standing Beauty
